# GState

# Methods

# font(String | Font font=HELVETICA, Number size=14)

  • Props:
    • font- String | Font, defaults to "HELVETICA"
    • size- Number, defaults to "14"
  • Returns: GState

# opacity(Number opacity)

  • Props:
    • opacity- Number
  • Returns: GState

# scale(Number | Point scale)

  • Props:
    • scale- Number | Point
  • Returns: GState

# align(Align align)

  • Props:
    • align- Align
  • Returns: GState

# characterSpacing(Number characterSpacing)

  • Props:
    • characterSpacing- Number
  • Returns: GState

# dashPattern(DashPattern dashPattern)

  • Props:
    • dashPattern- DashPattern
  • Returns: GState

# fillColor(Color fillColor)

  • Props:
    • fillColor- Color
  • Returns: GState

# fillOpacity(Number fillOpacity)

  • Props:
    • fillOpacity- Number
  • Returns: GState

# justifyUsingWordSpace(Boolean justifyUsingWordSpace)

  • Props:
    • justifyUsingWordSpace- Boolean
  • Returns: GState

# leading(Number leading)

  • Props:
    • leading- Number
  • Returns: GState

# lineBreak(Boolean lineBreak)

  • Props:
    • lineBreak- Boolean
  • Returns: GState

# lineCap(LineCap lineCap)

  • Props:
    • lineCap- LineCap
  • Returns: GState

# lineJoin(LineJoin lineJoin)

  • Props:
    • lineJoin- LineJoin
  • Returns: GState

# lineWidth(Number lineWidth)

  • Props:
    • lineWidth- Number
  • Returns: GState

# miterLimit(Number miterLimit)

  • Props:
    • miterLimit- Number
  • Returns: GState

# rotate(Number rotate)

  • Props:
    • rotate- Number
  • Returns: GState

# rotateBasePoint(BasePoint rotateBasePoint)

  • Props:
    • rotateBasePoint- BasePoint
  • Returns: GState

  • Props:
    • scaleBasePoint- BasePoint
  • Returns: GState

# strokeColor(Color strokeColor)

  • Props:
    • strokeColor- Color
  • Returns: GState

# strokeOpacity(Number strokeOpacity)

  • Props:
    • strokeOpacity- Number
  • Returns: GState

# textAlign(TextAlign textAlign)

  • Props:
    • textAlign- TextAlign
  • Returns: GState

  • Returns: GState
